nodes.text: The over-under formation was a starfighter tactic that was visually similar to a picket line with one important difference; it was comprised of two wings, and one was in advance of the other, creating two lines. Once enemy ships engaged the first line, the second line would spring the trap and engage the enemy already committed to battle. Flight Commander Margo Flarestream utilized an over-under formation during the Last Stand at Refnar.
